attributes.action: Introduce a law to drastically cut parliamentary salaries to 30,000 pounds, ministerial additions to 10,000 and Cabinet additions to a further 10,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that too mcuh in tax revenue is expended paying our representatives. People should be representatives because of a sense of duty and responsibility, not for large salaries. i do not advocate the removal of all compensation for work because that woul lead to corruption on a large scale

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
